aircraft.value: Griffin Guard - AC-7404-751 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Paint coating disbondment. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 26/06/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 24/06/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 27/06/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 02/07/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
